text:
After pouring the water...
scrub, scrub... swish, swish...♪

Oh, did you wash the vase?
Thanks for that.

Thanks to both of you, it looks good as new.
...Now, what kind of flowers should I give her?

Haha, vibrant and beautiful roses... huh? Apparently, the
meaning changes depending on the color and number, you know?

I-is that so...?
Well, I'm not really knowledgeable about that...

Wow... they'll watch over everyone...
gentle and hardworking... these flowers...♪

I see...!
Then they'll probably watch over everyone too.

With their vibrant colors and beauty,
they seem perfect for everyone.

Uh...
you say such cheesy things so casually, huh...!
